chat.title: üí¨ Chat
chat.textInputPlaceholder: Text chat mode...Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line

api.freeVersionDesc: No registration required, select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below
api.step1: Register an account on Alibaba Cloud and complete real-name verification
api.step2: Visit Alibaba Cloud Bailian Platform API Key Management page
api.step3: Create a new API Key and click the copy button
api.step4: Paste the API Key into the input box below
api.tip: üí° Please ensure the API Key format is correct. Service restart is required after saving.
api.tip2: üìù In personal use environment, API Key will be fully displayed for copying.
api.newbieRecommend: üéâ Newbie Recommendation: If you don't have an API Key yet, you can select "Free Version" in Advanced Options below to start using without registering any account!
api.assistApiDesc: Assist API: Handles memory management and custom voice
api.aliFeature: Alibaba: Free quota available, supports custom voice
api.glmFeature: GLM: More free quota, built-in web search
api.stepFeature: StepFun: Free quota available, video not supported
api.openaiFeature: OpenAI: Requires VPN, expensive, high intelligence level
api.siliconFeature: SiliconFlow: Good value, limited features, only for Assist API
api.freeVersionSuggestion: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice, Agent mode, and video chat not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestion: Core API: Handles conversation functionality, choose based on budget and needs
api.assistApiSuggestion: Assist API: Handles memory management and custom voice, only Alibaba supports custom voice
api.freeVersionCore: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, but custom voice, Agent mode, and video chat not supported
api.aliCore: Alibaba: Free quota available, comprehensive features
api.glmCore: GLM: Free quota available, requires 1 yuan recharge, built-in web search
api.stepCore: StepFun: Completely free, but video not supported
api.openaiCore: OpenAI: Highest intelligence level, but requires VPN and expensive
api.assistApiTitle: Assist API handles memory management and custom voice:
api.freeVersionAssist: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, but custom voice not supported
api.aliAssist: Alibaba: Recommended choice, supports custom voice
api.assistApiNote: Note: Only Alibaba supports custom voice functionality
api.assistApiKeyPlaceholder: Optional, defaults to Core API Key
api.freeVersionNoApiKey: Free version does not require API Key
api.freeVersionOnlyWhenCoreFree: Free Version (Only available when Core API is Free Version)
api.freeVersionConfig: Free Version Configuration: Supports voice chat, text chat, and memory management. Custom voice, Agent mode, and video chat not supported
api.qwenRecommendation: When Alibaba is the Core API, it's recommended to also select Alibaba as Assist API for the best custom voice experience
api.glmRecommendation: When GLM is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.openaiRecommendation: When OpenAI is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.stepRecommendation: When StepFun is the Core API, it's recommended to select Alibaba as Assist API to support custom voice functionality
api.assistApiTooltipTitle: Assist API handles memory management and custom voice:
api.aliRecommended: Alibaba: Recommended choice, supports custom voice
api.glmMemoryFree: GLM: Memory management permanently free, supports Agent mode
api.onlyAliCustomVoice: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Only Alibaba supports custom voice functionality
api.freeVersionSuggestionFull: Free Version: Completely free, no API Key needed, suitable for beginners (custom voice, Agent mode, and video chat not supported)
api.coreApiSuggestionFull: Core API: Handles conversation functionality, choose based on budget and needs
api.assistApiSuggestionFull: Assist API: Handles memory management and custom voice, only Alibaba supports custom voice
api.mcpRouterTokenDescText: Authentication token for accessing MCP Router service. Required when MCP functionality is enabled. Leave empty if your MCP Router does not require authentication.

apiKeyChangeWarning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Notice
apiKeyChangeWarning.message: Detected that you are changing API Key. Please note the following:
apiKeyChangeWarning.voiceIdBinding: Voice ID is bound to your API Key. All registered Voice IDs will become invalid after changing API Key
apiKeyChangeWarning.voiceIdCleared: The system will automatically clear locally saved Voice ID records after you save the new API Key
apiKeyChangeWarning.reRegisterVoice: It is recommended to re-register the required voices after changing API Key

api.summaryModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter Summary Model API Key
api.correctionModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter Correction Model API Key
api.emotionModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter Emotion Model API Key
api.visionModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter Vision Model API Key
api.omniModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter Omni Model API Key
api.ttsModelApiKeyPlaceholder: Please enter TTS Model API Key
api.omniApiUrlNote: (Must be a WebSocket address starting with ws:// or wss://)
api.currentUsingFreeVersion: üìã Currently Using: Free Version (No API Key Required)
api.customApiEnabledDesc: Custom API Enabled: Core API and Assist API have been disabled
api.customApiEnabledNote: Please configure APIs for each functional module in the Custom API Configuration below
api.customApiDescriptionText: These APIs are used for specific functional modules, such as summary generation, text correction, sentiment analysis, visual recognition, full-modal dialogue, and speech synthesis. Each API requires separate configuration for vendor, URL, and API Key.
api.customApiWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: After enabling custom APIs, core APIs and auxiliary APIs will be disabled and cannot be modified.
api.enableCustomApiNote: After enabling, custom API configuration will be used, disabling modifications to core APIs and auxiliary APIs

voice.title: Voice Registration
voice.selectFile: Select local audio file (15~20 seconds recommended, max 45 seconds, wav/mp3 format)
voice.prefixPlaceholder: Maximum 10 characters, numbers and English letters only
voice.pleaseUploadFile: Please upload an audio file and fill in the prefix
voice.voiceIdSaved: voice_id has been automatically saved to character
voice.pageWillRefresh: Current page will automatically refresh to apply new voice
voice.voiceWillTakeEffect: New voice will take effect in the next conversation

memory.title: Memory Browser
memory.tip1: Recently ended conversations will take a moment to load. You can click the catgirl name again to refresh.
memory.tip2: When exiting the App version, please right-click the system tray to exit memory management.
